page.title: 10GETTING OUT AND ABOUT
page.content: In{Ampney Crucis}village, there are over 160 cars. 46 households have 2 or more cars. At least 17 households have no car. Out of 162 people questioned, 94 had never used the bus service, 40 seldom used it and 29 used it often. A service nine times a day from{Fairford to{Cirencester}along the A 417. Marchant's village bus goes to{ {Cirencester}on Tuesday, Friday and Saturday. Before the re-opening of the Post Office inadequate transport made it difficult for pensioners to find enough time to collect their pensions in {Cirencester},so some car owners took them to{Poulton}Post Office. Transport is provided to the comprehensive schools but has to be paid for by parents. Some pupils cycle. Students find transport to { {Swindon}or{Gloucester}difficult to obtain.
